char_XXXX_ABCDEF.desc: Can deploy up to 8 Grzmot Miness (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a Grzmot Mines will trigger its effect, on retreat activate Grzmot Mine 's effect on self
Can deploy up to 10<@ba.talpu>（+2）</> Grzmot Miness (Can store up to 10); The first enemy that steps on a Grzmot Mines will trigger its effect, on retreat activate Grzmot Mine 's effect on self
Has a 20% chance to deal 150% physical damage, 100% chance on enemies under Grzmot Miness 's effect
Has a 20% chance to deal 150% <@ba.talpu>（+2%）</>physical damage, 100% chance on enemies under Grzmot Miness 's effect
Has 65% chance to dodge Ranged Physical attacks
Has 65%<@ba.talpu>（+2%）</> chance to dodge Ranged Physical attacks

When deployed, Iana places a hologram on the deployment tile. The hologram does not attack; When the hologram is attacked, inflict 20% <$ba.fragile>Fragile</> to the attacker for XXX seconds and remove <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>, then immediately swap to [Substitute]
